testcase.classname: To Register and validate the login of facebook application
testcase.name: The project of creation of new account in FB
testcase.system-out: Given Enduser has to launch the chrome browser and maximize the window......passed When Enduser has to launch the url of facebook application..................passed And Enduser has to click the create new account button......................passed And Enduser has to enter the firstname in firstname box.....................passed And Enter the Surname in Surname box........................................passed And Enduser has to enter the mobileno or email in that textbox..............passed And Enduser has to enter the new password in new password box...............passed Then Enduser has to close the chrome browser................................passed
